attributes.review: Horrible app. Would not recommend. It took almost 6 weeks to download and threatened me when opening the app. I would give it 0 stars if I could, it also shows content i wish I never saw☠️
attributes.title: Black lives matter

attributes.review: it was so bad because i kept seeing this cheeto on my screen 😞 i was so disgusted and i kept getting so much glitches and 😹 ugh omg THEY NEED A BETTER APP !! 😇 like dude baddie but the bad is silent 😏 anyways dump trump 😝 and obama 2020 😹 bernie 2020 🥳 yeah anyways um chile i have to go delete this app now 😉 it's been on my phone for too long 😒

attributes.review: I downloaded this by accident and now I’m lost, where am I, the app keeps crashing and the gps won’t load pls help I don’t know where I am. I feel like this area Is unsettling and the app keeps crashing omg i can’t get out without the gps but isn’t working help.
attributes.title: Oops

attributes.review: This app is horrible! Please don’t download it!!!!! There are so many viruses and illegal hacking bugs on it, they found my address and kidnapped my baby sister! When she was delivered back to us, she was covered in diarrhea with “I Love Trump” tattooed onto her forehead! Please delete this app, my sister is traumatized and still reeks.
attributes.title: Omg!!!!!

attributes.review: this app literally is horrible and it makes me want to gauge my eyes out and become blind and deaf. the app doesn’t even open and all of the trumpies and saying it does, but it doesn’t. i wanted to get this app so i could see how bad of a president trump is but it won’t even open
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: This app is not good, although I do support trump and wanted to get all of his updates the easier this was not the way to do it. I got a bug on my phone and now I have to get a new one. This phone is now littered with inappropriate pop up adds everywhere!
attributes.title: Not ok

attributes.review: Trump is not a President, but a dictator! What gives him the authority to constantly threaten our Governors, and now state school officials if they don’t submit to him? He wants to force Governors to send out children back to school and risk their health. He is willing to sacrifice our kids for political gain. He does not need to be relected!
attributes.title: Dictator

attributes.review:
First of all, I will like to give my honest opinion on how this app has made my phone glitch so badly that the other apps I have on my phone have been opening and closing by their own. I expected OUR president to have all the necessary equipment to make an app which let us CITIZENS interact with daily news. I AM NOT HAPPY

Also, I don’t really know how you have so many children when it’s only half an inch😂
I’m not surprised if every wife you had has an orange tinted 🐱

‼️BLM‼️

Sincerely,

A local tiktoker
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: I was really exited to use the app but when I downloaded it and opened it, the app glitched and deleted everything off my phone. I didn’t even know an app could do that. I guess that’s what you get when you let a Cheeto develop an app
attributes.title: Don’t download this app

attributes.review: This is the most terrible app i’ve ever used. This app has so many issues and it has terrible Quality. This is unacceptable. I haven’t ever been this disappointed in a app so much in my entire life. This has been such a waste of my time.
attributes.title: Terrible App
